00044   void SeekOn(){m_activeFlags |= seek;} //bitwise OR

00048   void SeekOff(){if(on(seek)) m_activeFlags ^= seek;} //bitwise XOR

00407   {
00408       seek               = 0x00002, //0
00409       flee               = 0x00004, //1
00410       arrive             = 0x00008, //2
00411       wander             = 0x00010, //3
